django.core.serializers.xml_serializer

XML serializer.

Exceptions

DefusedXmlException

Base exception.

DTDForbidden

Document type definition is forbidden.

EntitiesForbidden

Entity definition is forbidden.

ExternalReferenceForbidden

Resolving an external reference is forbidden.

Classes

Serializer

Serialize a QuerySet to XML.

Deserializer

Deserialize XML.

DefusedExpatParser

An expat parser hardened against XML bomb attacks.

Functions

getInnerText(node)

Get all the inner text of a DOM node (recursively).

Module Contents

class django.core.serializers.xml_serializer.Serializer[source]

Bases: django.core.serializers.base.Serializer

Serialize a QuerySet to XML.

indent(level)[source]
start_serialization()[source]

Start serialization – open the XML document and the root element.

end_serialization()[source]

End serialization – end the document.

start_object(obj)[source]

Called as each object is handled.

end_object(obj)[source]

Called after handling all fields for an object.

handle_field(obj, field)[source]

Handle each field on an object (except for ForeignKeys and ManyToManyFields).

handle_fk_field(obj, field)[source]

Handle a ForeignKey (they need to be treated slightly differently from regular fields).

handle_m2m_field(obj, field)[source]

Handle a ManyToManyField. Related objects are only serialized as references to the object’s PK (i.e. the related data is not dumped, just the relation).

reset()[source]

This method is called after close has been called to reset the parser so that it is ready to parse new documents. The results of calling parse or feed after close without calling reset are undefined.
